events.title: Park Cleanup Drive
events.description: Join us in cleaning up the beautiful English Garden. Help us keep Munich green and pristine.

events.title: Soup Kitchen Volunteering
events.description: Assist in preparing and serving meals for those in need at the Munich Community Kitchen.
events.location: Munich Community Kitchen, Sonnenstraße 25, Munich, Germany

events.title: City Tree Planting
events.description: Help plant trees to improve Munich’s air quality and beautify our neighborhoods.

events.title: Music Jam Session
events.description: Join fellow music enthusiasts for an informal jam session. Bring your instruments or just your voice and enjoy the rhythm!

events.title: Community Meetup: Coffee and Conversations
events.description: A relaxed gathering to meet new people, share stories, and build connections over coffee.

events.title: Basic Sewing Workshop
events.description: Learn the basics of sewing while creating simple and useful items. Materials provided.

events.title: Book Drive Sorting
events.description: Sort and pack books for donation to underprivileged schools in Munich.
events.location: Munich Public Library, Am Gasteig, Munich, Germany

events.title: Local Food Market Support
events.description: Assist local farmers and vendors at the Viktualienmarkt with setting up stalls and interacting with customers.

events.title: Isar River Cleanup
events.description: Help clean up the Isar River banks to preserve this beautiful natural spot for everyone.
events.location: Isar River, near Wittelsbacherbrücke, Munich, Germany

events.title: Discussion Circle: Urban Loneliness
events.description: A moderated discussion to explore ideas and solutions for addressing loneliness in city life.
